mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, user_id, festival_id, file_path,file_ori_name,file_save_name,cate,regist_date) values (#{title}, #{content},#{userId}, #{festivalId},#{filePath},#{fileOriName},#{fileSaveName},#{cate}, now())
mapper.select:
select board_id, title, content, user_id, festival_id, date_format(regist_date,'%Y-%m-%d') regist_date,file_path,file_ori_name,file_save_name,cate from board
where cate like 'deal'
where cate like 'hugi'
order by regist_date limit #{start}, #{viewPage}

select count(board_id) from board
where cate like 'deal'
where cate like 'hugi'

select b.board_id,b.title, b.content, b.user_id, b.festival_id, date_format(b.regist_date,'%Y-%m-%d') regist_date,b.file_path,b.file_ori_name,b.file_save_name, b.cate, c.comment_id, c.user_id comment_userid, c.content comment_content , date_format(c.regist_date,'%Y-%m-%d') comment_registtime from board b left outer join comment c on b.board_id=c.board_id where b.board_id = #{boardId}
